title: T-Mobile Un-carrier event set for May 4
content:
After posting strong first-quarter numbers for 2022, it looks like T-Mobile isn’t going to rest on its laurels. The U.S. carrier has announced a new event set for May 4. The teaser image has it pegged as an Un-carrier event, so things could become quite interesting. Although the details are sparse at this point, the

The post T-Mobile Un-carrier event set for May 4 appeared first on XDA.
description: T-Mobile has announced plans for an event on May 4. The event will carry the Un-carrier branding, which could usher in some welcome changes.
